# GL Unified Charter Activated
# Consolidated Reports Archive

This directory contains historical reports that have been consolidated for archival purposes.
All reports follow machine-native standards: single source, auditable, replayable, verifiable.

## Structure

- `ci/` - All CI/CD related reports consolidated
- `integration/` - All integration and merge reports consolidated
- `phases/` - All phase-based progress reports consolidated
- `code-quality/` - All code quality and remediation reports consolidated
- `misc/` - Other miscellaneous reports

## Consolidation Date

Generated: 2026-01-18

## Purpose

These reports represent historical snapshots of project progress. They are archived here
to maintain a clean root directory while preserving auditability and traceability.
